response.original_title: Scott & Crowley: A Comic Book Adventure
response.overview: Two average comic nerds, Scott and Crowley, accidentally find the rarest comic book known to man...only to lose it minutes later. As word of the rare book spreads, Scott and Crowley must race against every elite geek in town to get it back.
response.tagline: Two average comic nerds, Scott and Crowley, accidentally find the rarest comic book known to man...only to lose it
response.title: Scott & Crowley: A Comic Book Adventure
